name: Elm Raycording
body:
### A mobile raycasting hack in Elm

Kris Jenkins [wrote a raycaster in Elm](https://github.com/krisajenkins/elm-rays).  I've just put it in an app.

You'll need Cordova and Elm.

```
npm install -g cordova

git clone https://github.com/benagain/elm-rays.git && cd elm-rays

npm install
cordova platform add android
cordova run android --
```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
